title: Inquiry About Outage Cause
description: After a power outage has been restored, a customer calls to ask what caused it.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and the recent outage event that affected them.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the record of the outage that occurred yesterday.

tasks.description: Retrieve the cause code and notes from the closed work order in the outage management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the cause was 'Animal Contact' and the crew notes mention a squirrel on a transformer.

tasks.description: Communicate the cause of the outage to the customer in clear, non-technical language.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent explains that the outage was caused by an animal interfering with the equipment.
